Player History
Released by Capital City on 1/31/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/4/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,005,800 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/13/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1985, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/1987, off Hugh Ly (SYR)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1987, going 5-0, 2.14...
Hit first career homerun on 7/23/1987, off Justin Smith (SHP)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1988, going 4-2, 1.56...
Released by Capital City on 4/21/1991...
